tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
tokens.translation: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
tokens.translation: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, set upright; hence (figuratively as adjective) just; but usually (as adverb or conjunction) rightly or so (in various applications to manner, time and relation; often with other particles)
tokens.translation: properly, set upright; hence (figuratively as adjective) just; but usually (as adverb or conjunction) rightly or so (in various applications to manner, time and relation; often with other particles)

tokens.resolved_gloss: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
tokens.translation: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)

tokens.resolved_gloss: (the) self-Existent or Eternal; Jeho-vah, Jewish national name of God
tokens.translation: (the) self-Existent or Eternal; Jeho-vah, Jewish national name of God

tokens.resolved_gloss: a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts
tokens.translation: a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts

tokens.resolved_gloss: an appellation, as a mark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, i.e. play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music
